author: entertainment.ie
title: Man-Cave | Watch: Kids reaction to seeing their Dad for the first time in 4 months is just lovely
text:
Tamara Nicolao filmed this video of her two children seeing their father for the first time in 4 months.
After the father moved the family to The Bahamas from Las Vegas for work, the kids found themselves homesick for America, so he moved them home and commuted the long distance.
This is a very simple, but genuinely touching video.
